text:

This is just deplorable…💔

author: Aliyan Kashif
text:
Let's build a scenario
Students residing out of Lhr, khi, Isd have to travel back, mostly through public transportation Then hostels and exams.. Icap can follow sop in exam hall but not out of hall.Risk is there for not 3k students but 3k families @icapofficial @Shafqat_Mahmood

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: ♥️ May this beautiful occasion of Eid gives you all reason to make your life even more beautiful wishing you happy Eid day #EidMubark

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: This #PlaneCrash news is quite devastating. My heart & prayers goes out to those we have lost in this tragic accident. May Allah SWT elevate their ranks and give Sabre Jameel to their families & loved ones. Indeed we all belong to Allah SWT and to Him we all shall return...😭😭

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: #promoteafcstudents @icapofficial have to promote afc student because the conference is about to cancel all broad exams...We lost a lot of time in afc although it just about 3 month course but we spend 9 month that must be a lot of time to be consider...!

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: It really does feel like a personal loss. Thank you #IrrfanKhan for all that you contributed to the art form. For leading life by example. Thank you & may you rest in peace 🙏💔

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: The things which look brighter in dark  have different look in daylight...!

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: We are always getting a lesson from out surrounding but don’t make any effort to acquire a skill to implement it in life...

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: Please stay at home. Physical distancing. Hygiene. And respect all who r doing amazing work on ground.  Just Love a lot more and do nothing...because ‘Jo kuch nahi karte woh kamaal karte hain..’

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: It’s been a while that I heard this beautiful afternoon silence. A little amount of laziness and quiet ☀️ . Now evening is entering. Time to grab a cup of ☕️ . Wah!

author: Aliyan Kashif
text: What a busy year...😁
